constructs.name: Emotional Enmeshment (Indian Family Context)
constructs.description: Blurred boundaries where individual identity is secondary to family loyalty.
internal_dialogue: If I am happy without them, I am selfish.
constructs.cultural_modifiers: High social 'obligation' index; 'Log Kya Kahenge' logic.

constructs.name: Performance-Based Self-Worth
constructs.description: The belief that value as a human is entirely tied to academic or career achievement.
internal_dialogue: If I fail, I am a failure as a son/daughter.

distortions.name: 'Log Kya Kahenge' (LKK) Amplification Bias
distortions.description: Overestimating the negative impact of neighborhood/family judgment on one's life safety.
distortions.internal_example: If they find out I went to a therapist, our entire family's reputation will be destroyed.
